title: Emote bug?
body: My emotes are sometimes blank in some games and sometimes they're working fine. Is it just me experiencing these issues?

replies.body: Yea, dont know what causes it but about 40% of  my games have blank emotes
Yeah it's happening to me too. In fact, I queued for a game of Odyssey and 3 players and myself didn't have our augments. I wonder if it's a similar reason.
